skills.skill: Preparation of plans, drawings, and specifications for bridge construction
Structural analysis and bridge design software
Excellent writing and verbal communication skills

duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform intricate calculations, sophisticated designs, and important construction and safety inspections for bridges.
Preparation of plans, drawings, and specifications for bridge construction or repair.
Performing load ratings and other calculations.
Communication and collaboration with multi-disciplinary teams on State, Local Government, and private projects.

education_certification.credential: B.S. in Civil Engineering (or related field) with an Engineer in Training (EIT)
